justification: "In the feeling thermometer, participants reported how warm they felt ... These feeling thermometer questions have been used to measure attitudes explicitly".
"For convergent validity, we used two instruments to assess the participants' attitudes: (1) a feeling thermometer and (2) a generative narrative survey".
"The survey required participants to self-report their political views from extremely liberal to extremely conservative on a 7-point Likert scale".
"To confirm that the participants indeed attended to the questions and to test their comprehension, the survey included five narratives in which the question was directly related to the narrative".
